channel.title: [639]Quantum[639] logout lag (mysql)
channel.description:
so yea i have the quantum source and everytime a player logs off it will lag for like 5 seconds at first i thought it was due to players getting saved to prevent dupes but i have made some research into it and i suspect it has something to do with myssql trying to save the players on the hiscore but cannot find the server? or sumthing
so does any1 know how to remove the myssql hiscores saving from quantum like should i delete anything or like remove some methods?
thx :D

item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

the thing is i dont know anything about myssql and i dont haf a webhost plus i dont think its worth the bother for a hiscores so i just want to remove it but idk how
